root.name: The F.A. Premier League Stars 2001
root.description: OverviewThe F.A. Premier League Stars 2001 is a soccer game developed by Krisalis Software (Game Boy Color version) and EA (PC and Playstation Versions). The F.A. Premier League Stars 2001 was published by EA on all platforms. The F.A. Premier League Stars 2001 was only released in European countries.
